sentence.Network_en: This particular model has a further refinement.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一款式又有了进一步的改进。

sentence.Network_en: All programs have bugs and need endless refinement.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的程序都有漏洞,都需要不断改进.

sentence.Network_en: A greater refinement of the categorization is possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 进行更加精细的分类是可能的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 常用托福tpo听力词汇整理_天道留学 ... flatten 变平，变调 refinement 精致，精巧 Uranium 铀.
石油英语词汇(R2)|生物化学专业英语词汇 ... refined white wax 精白蜡 refinement 改进；加密；精炼 refiner 炼油工人.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... embezzlement 贪污，侵吞 refinement 提炼，文雅 atonement 赎罪，弥补.
(6) 类图的抽象层次和细化(Refinement)关系 　　需要注意的是,虽然在软件开发的不同阶段都使用类图,但这些类图表示了不同层次的抽象。

list.abs: 保护心脏：远离十大坏习惯-英语点津 ... oversize 大于一般的，太大的 refined 精炼的，精制的 blood clot 血块.
花语_互动百科 ... 纯洁（ Purity） 高雅（refined）（ Refined） 虚伪（ Falsehood）.
房屋重新贷款(Refinance)通常就是通过重新签订一笔新房屋贷款（在房屋净值足够时，新贷款的金额可大于原贷款所剩贷款本金余额…
按揭贷款人随时可以做“再贷款”(Refinance)来拿出大量现金, 或是非常容易地卖掉房产然后套得大笔利润, 生活中活生生的例子信手拈来。
考博英语词汇 ... referral n. 工作的分派；治疗安排 refine v. 精练；精制；提纯；精炼 refluent a. 倒流的，回流的.
精字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 精湛〖 masterly〗 精制〖 refine〗 精致〖 finesse〗.

means.word_mean: 精炼;优美;精心的安排;精确

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from refine + -ment, influenced by French raffinement

entry.def: Refinements are small changes or additions that you make to something in order to improve it. Refinement is the process of making refinements.

example.ex: Older cars inevitably lack the latest safety refinements.
example.tran: 老款的汽车难免缺少经过改进的最新安全保护装置。

entry.def: Refinement is politeness and good manners.

example.ex: ...a girl who possessed both dignity and refinement.
example.tran: 既有尊严又有教养的女孩

means.word_mean: 1. a highly developed state of perfection; having a flawless or impeccable quality;

sentences.sentence: "I admired the exquisite refinement of his prose"
"almost an inspiration which gives to all work that finish which is almost art"--Joseph Conrad
"he described a refinement of this technique"

means.word_mean: 3. the process of removing impurities (as from oil or metals or sugar etc.)
4. a subtle difference in meaning or opinion or attitude;

sentences.sentence: "without understanding the finer nuances you can't enjoy the humor"

means.word_mean: 5. the quality of excellence in thought and manners and taste;

sentences.sentence: "he is remembered for his generosity and civilization"

auth_sentence.content: Bird's effort was a refinement of that approach.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bird's effort was a refinement of that approach.

auth_sentence.content: In the refinement of their highly educated...benevolent and felicitous lives.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the refinement of their highly educated...benevolent and felicitous lives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the refinement of their highly educated...benevolent and felicitous lives.

auth_sentence.content: There could be refinement of criteria for eligibility for surgery.
auth_sentence.res_content: There could be refinement of criteria for eligibility for surgery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There could be refinement of criteria for eligibility for surgery.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: allure吸引+ment具体物→n.诱惑物
embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
stems_affixes.word_buile: disagree有分歧;不一致+ment行为或结果等→n.意见不同,不调和,争执,不和,争论
embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
stems_affixes.word_buile: establish建立+ment行为或结果等→n.建立,设立,建立的机构[或组织]
fulfill完成+ment行为或结果等→n.完成,履行
govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: manage管理+ment行为或结果等→n.经营,管理;处理,操纵;管理部门
measure测量+ment行为或结果等→n.测量法,度量
move移动+ment行为或结果等→n.运动,活动;移动,迁移
pay支付+ment行为或结果等→n.付款,支付,报酬
pre预先+dica命令+ment行为或结果等→预先命令做→进入困境
refine精炼,精制+ment行为或结果等→n.精致,文雅,精巧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 点心,饮料,精力恢复,爽快
stems_affixes.word_buile: refresh使清新+ment行为或结果等→精力恢复,爽快→点心,饮料
commence开始+ment行为或结果等→开始→毕业典礼[开始新的旅程]

means.word_mean: 细微的改良; （精细的）改进, 改善

sentences.en: All programs have bugs and need endless refinement.
sentences.cn: 所有的程序都有漏洞，都需要不断改进。

sentences.cn: 对基本系统进行一些有益的改良是可能的。

means.word_mean: 优雅或高贵的动作、举止等, 优雅, 礼貌, 有教养
